attributes.action: Less biased towards disabled 'passengers' issue them parking badges.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Why do disabled adults (such as down syndrome, mentally disabled) who will 'always' be passengers and never drivers, the automatic right to parking badges. They have to rely upon designated drivers to drive them, so why not make it easier for them to receive badges, regardless of how far they walk.
